messages.title: Brexit Deal Agreed and Ready to Go
messages.content: New Brexit deal agreed with EU. Protects jobs and trade. Ends uncertainty for our economy. Ready to go from day one of a new parliament.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: A New Brexit deal has been agreed with the EU that is promised to protect jobs and trade while ending uncertainty for the economy, ready to be implemented from the first day of a new parliament.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Voters in Workington will decide this election

issues.brexitEurope: New Brexit deal agreed with EU.
issues.health: PM on hospitals, police and schools.

images.caption: BREAKING NEWS: Brexit Deal Agreed and Ready to Go
